era:creation-primeval:creation-vocation:.title: Light and darkness are separated and time begins to tick
Skies, seas, and fertile ground emerge in rhythm
Creatures fill sea, sky, and land with abundance
Humans receive God’s image and co-rule mandate

era:creation-primeval:garden-beginnings:.title: Eden is planted as a sanctuary-workshop
Marriage covenant launches a new household
Serpent deception fractures trust and exile follows
Promise of a wounded rescuer is whispered

era:creation-primeval:from-cities-to-flo.title: Cain builds a city even as mercy marks his exile
Generations advance craft, music, and revenge
Noah builds an ark while culture mocks the warning
Waters reset the earth and a rainbow seals covenant

era:creation-primeval:nations-disperse:0.title: Noah’s family replants vineyards and trades blessing & folly
Nations list details families spreading with unique gifts
Tower builders chase fame and are scattered with new tongues
Abram hears the call to leave home for an unseen land

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:01.title: Abram leaves Ur and raises an altar at Shechem

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:02.title: Famine drives a risky trip to Egypt and back

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:03.title: Covenant of pieces seals promises under the stars

era:patriarchs:abraham-s-journey:04.title: Visitors announce Isaac and judge the cities of the plain

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:01.title: Hagar meets God in the desert and names Him “The God who sees”

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:02.title: Circumcision sign marks the household as set apart

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:03.title: Isaac is offered on Moriah and rescued by a ram

era:patriarchs:promise-tested-secured:04.title: Sarah’s field becomes a burial site anchoring the land

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:01.title: Jacob bargains for a birthright over stew

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:02.title: A ladder dream at Bethel assures divine presence

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:03.title: Years with Laban forge a large yet conflicted family

era:patriarchs:jacob-transformed:04.title: Wrestling at Peniel leaves Jacob limping yet blessed

era:patriarchs:joseph-preserves-the-clan.title: Dreams of sheaves and stars fuel brothers’ jealousy
Joseph is sold, resists temptation, and is imprisoned
Interpretation of royal dreams leads to a new post
Famine reunites the family in Goshen with forgiveness

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:01.title: Baby Moses is hidden, discovered, and adopted

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:02.title: Years in Midian hone humility and shepherd skills

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:03.title: Burning bush encounter reveals “I AM” and a mission

era:exodus-sinai:deliverer-prepared:04.title: Moses debates God yet finally returns to Egypt

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:01.title: Staffs become serpents before hardened hearts

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:02.title: Waters turn to blood and plagues escalate

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:03.title: Passover night marks homes with lamb’s blood

era:exodus-sinai:egypt-confronted:04.title: Exodus begins as slaves walk out laden with gifts

era:exodus-sinai:into-the-wilderness-cla.title: Red Sea parts, Miriam leads songs of victory
Bitter water turns sweet and manna appears
Amalek attacks and hands are raised for victory
Jethro mentors Moses on shared leadership

era:exodus-sinai:sinai-covenant-dwelling.title: Thunderous glory rests on Sinai as people pledge obedience
Golden calf crisis sparks intercession and renewed mercy
Artisans craft a tabernacle from willing offerings
Cloud and fire settle on the completed dwelling

era:wilderness-conquest:lessons-in-trust.title: Spies survey Canaan and the crowd chooses fear
Korah’s revolt challenges authority and ends dramatically
Rock is struck twice and leadership consequences follow
Bronze serpent lifts hope amid poisonous bites

era:wilderness-conquest:east-side-victor.title: God turns Balaam’s curses into blessings
Battles on the east secure land for Reuben, Gad, and half-Manasseh
Moses delivers farewell discourses rehearsing the story
Joshua is commissioned before the nation

era:wilderness-conquest:crossing-and-rem.title: Jordan River stops as priests stand with the ark
Stones from the river become a memorial at Gilgal
Covenant signs are renewed before Passover in the land
Manna ends as people eat the land’s produce

era:wilderness-conquest:campaigns-allotm.title: Jericho’s walls fall after worshipful marches
Ai exposes hidden sin then becomes a victory
Southern and northern coalitions are defeated
Land is allotted, cities of refuge named, and Joshua issues a final challenge

era:judges-kingdom:cycles-of-deliverance.title: Othniel launches the pattern of rest and relapse
Ehud assassinates a tyrant with a hidden dagger
Deborah and Barak partner to bring victory and song
Gideon tears down altars and learns reliance

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:01.title: Jephthah negotiates and laments a rash vow

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:02.title: Samson wages solo wars against the Philistines

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:03.title: Dark tales of civil strife reveal the need for a king

era:judges-kingdom:from-chaos-to-hope:04.title: Ruth and Boaz illustrate loyal love and lineage

era:judges-kingdom:samuel-bridges-the-er.title: Hannah’s prayer and dedication bring Samuel to Shiloh
The ark is captured, Dagon falls, and the ark returns
God thunders against Philistines as Israel repents
People demand a king and Saul is chosen

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:01.title: Saul wins early battles yet disobeys and is rejected

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:02.title: David serves in Saul’s court and faces Goliath

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:03.title: David gains friends, flees, and spares Saul twice

era:judges-kingdom:saul-and-david:04.title: Saul falls on Mount Gilboa and David mourns

era:united-monarchy:david-s-reign:01.title: Tribes unite under David in Hebron

era:united-monarchy:david-s-reign:02.title: Jerusalem becomes political and worship center

era:united-monarchy:david-s-reign:04.title: Sin with Bathsheba brings confession and consequences

era:united-monarchy:family-turmoil-hope:.title: Amnon assaults Tamar and Absalom plots revenge
Absalom steals hearts and David flees the city
Rebellion ends abruptly and David grieves a son
Temple preparation plans are handed to Solomon

era:united-monarchy:solomon-s-glory:01.title: Solomon requests wisdom and receives abundance

era:united-monarchy:solomon-s-glory:03.title: Temple construction engages artisans for seven years

era:united-monarchy:solomon-s-glory:04.title: Dedication prayer invites heaven to hear prayers

era:united-monarchy:seeds-of-division:01.title: Queen of Sheba marvels at wisdom and wealth

era:united-monarchy:seeds-of-division:02.title: Foreign wives pull Solomon toward idolatry

era:united-monarchy:seeds-of-division:04.title: Jeroboam receives a prophecy of future rule

era:divided-kingdom:split-and-struggle:0.title: Rehoboam’s harsh reply fractures the kingdom
Jeroboam installs golden calves to secure loyalty
Prophets confront altars and predict a future Josiah
Reforms flicker in Judah while Israel drifts

era:divided-kingdom:elijah-elisha-era:02.title: Fire falls on Carmel and rain returns

era:divided-kingdom:elijah-elisha-era:03.title: Still small voice restores the weary prophet

era:divided-kingdom:elijah-elisha-era:04.title: Elisha receives the mantle and multiplies miracles

era:divided-kingdom:threats-from-empires.title: Jehu purges but fails to walk humbly
Assyria pressures Israel and captures Damascus
Jonah reluctantly preaches and Nineveh repents
Samaria falls and northern tribes are scattered

era:divided-kingdom:last-days-of-judah:0.title: Hezekiah trusts God as Assyria surrounds Jerusalem
Manasseh’s evil reign scars the nation yet ends with repentance
Josiah uncovers the scroll and leads sweeping reform
Babylon rises, Jehoiachin surrenders, and Jerusalem ultimately falls

era:exile-return:faith-in-foreign-courts.title: Daniel interprets dreams and preserves kings
Friends face the furnace and walk with God
Writing on the wall ushers in a new empire

era:exile-return:first-return:03.title: Foundation is laid with mixed tears and shouts

era:exile-return:first-return:04.title: Prophets Haggai and Zechariah restart the work

era:exile-return:protection-in-persia:01.title: Esther becomes queen against all odds

era:exile-return:protection-in-persia:03.title: Purim is established to remember deliverance

era:exile-return:renewed-worship-society.title: Ezra teaches Torah and confronts compromise
People confess, celebrate booths, and sign covenant
Malachi calls for wholehearted worship and future hope

era:messiah:big-picture:01.title: Birth narratives highlight humility and wonder

era:messiah:big-picture:02.title: Public ministry displays authority over sickness and storms

era:messiah:big-picture:03.title: Apprentices are formed into a kingdom team

era:messiah:big-picture:04.title: Passion, cross, and resurrection secure redemption

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:02.title: Shared life cares for the vulnerable and bold witness spreads

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:03.title: Persecution scatters seeds that become new gatherings

era:apostolic-church:church-launched:04.title: Households like Cornelius welcome the gospel

era:apostolic-church:mission-formation:0.title: Paul’s journeys plant communities across the Mediterranean
Jerusalem Council clarifies grace for Jews and Gentiles
Letters circulate shaping doctrine and practice
Witness reaches Rome even through imprisonment

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:01.title: John’s Revelation lifts eyes to the risen King

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:02.title: Churches are urged to persevere and repent

era:apostolic-church:future-hope:03.title: Lamb and throne imagery reframe allegiance

era:messiah:stage-01:01.title: Gabriel promises a son to Zechariah

era:messiah:stage-01:04.title: John is born and Zechariah sings

era:messiah:stage-01:08.title: Magi arrive with gifts and warnings

era:messiah:stage-01:09.title: Family escapes to Egypt and later returns

era:messiah:stage-02:01.title: Boy Jesus engages teachers in the temple

era:messiah:stage-02:02.title: John calls the nation to repentance

era:messiah:stage-02:04.title: Forty days of testing end with victory

era:messiah:stage-02:05.title: First disciples leave nets to follow

era:messiah:stage-02:07.title: Temple is cleared early in the ministry

era:messiah:stage-03:01.title: Sermon on the Mount reframes flourishing

era:messiah:stage-03:02.title: A paralytic is forgiven and walks home

era:messiah:stage-03:04.title: Legion of demons is cast out

era:messiah:stage-03:05.title: Feeding of thousands with a simple meal

era:messiah:stage-03:06.title: Jesus walks on water to rescue friends

era:messiah:stage-03:07.title: Mission of the Twelve multiplies ministry

era:messiah:stage-04:01.title: Peter confesses Jesus as the Messiah

era:messiah:stage-04:03.title: Seventy-two carry peace to new towns

era:messiah:stage-04:04.title: Rich young ruler wrestles with invitation

era:messiah:stage-05:06.title: Trials unfold before council and Pilate

era:messiah:stage-06:01.title: Women find the stone rolled away

era:messiah:stage-06:03.title: Jesus meets Mary in the garden

era:messiah:stage-06:04.title: Emmaus travelers recognize Jesus at the table

era:messiah:stage-06:07.title: Breakfast by the sea restores Peter

era:messiah:stage-06:09.title: Ascension blesses and points to return
